```{r setup}
library(RNAPerm)

```


```{r}
### Generate data from NB distribution and put into array
Y <- rnbinom(40*100, mu = 10, size = 1/0.2)
Y <- data.frame(array(Y, dim = c(40, 100)))
X <- as.factor(rep(c("A", "B"), each = 20))
ClassicPermTest(X, Y, 100)
```

hist(, breaks = 100)
